Author: jjfmish
Text: Right? It makes me so uncomfortable and I’d hate for some impressionable person who thinks they’re fat to stumble upon that cesspool and have it be the catalyst to an unhealthy relationship with food or even a full blown eating disorder.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I’ve stopped visiting that sub because I always left it feeling...like my soul needed a shower to wash off the judgement, dogma, and mean-spiritedness.    I mean, sometimes there were reasonable points, but when something repeatedly leaves me feeling icky...it’s time for me to walk away.
